response.original_title: Link Click Bridon Arc Special Screening
response.overview: To save Cheng Xiaoshi, Lu Guang returns to the very beginning, retracing fate’s path from square one. However, a photograph containing clues about Cheng Xiaoshi’s parents appears at the Lightime Studio. Determined to uncover the truth, Lu Guang sets off anxiously with Cheng Xiaoshi to Bridon. They encounter the seemingly friendly top model Xia Fei, the eccentric leader of Chinatown, Vein, and the mysterious Liu Xiao. Each person has their own agenda. Can Lu Guang break free from the deadly fate awaiting them?
response.title: Link Click Bridon Arc Special Screening
